div.p: The Separation Mode code system defines concepts that describe the category of discharge of a patient. Separation refers to the process by which an episode of care for an admitted patient ceases. The concepts defined in this code system are based on those defined in the METeOR value domain for Episode of admitted patient care - separation mode, code N https://meteor.aihw.gov.au/content/index.phtml/itemId/270094.
